name: ALT Education
summary: Operating system for all kinds of educational institutions from preschool to high school which provides integration of both students' and teacher's workplaces.
description: ALT Education 9 is aimed to ease the modern effective learning process for educational institutions at any level, including schools, colleges and universities. The distribution includes a wide range of desktop and server applications allowing to integrate students' and teacher's workplaces providing rich functionality.

name: ALT Rescue
summary: LiveCD distribution that is designed to help sysadmins fix and repair many kinds of problems with systems they are or feel responsible for.
description: ALT Rescue is a moderate sized (under 600 Mb in 64-bit flavour) console LiveCD distribution to
so it comes with tools aiding to:
• recover partitions and files deleted by accident
• wipe partitions or drives clean of residual information
• access Android devices, reset Windows passwords, etc

name: Simply Linux
summary: Operating system that is easy to set up and convenient to use, which allows the user to perform all kinds of everyday productivity tasks.
description: Simply Linux is an operating system that is easy to set up and convenient to use without feeling concerned about the virus risks and without having to spend time to find the necessary applications on the Internet or in shops.
